snippet.title: BrokenLore: Follow - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
BrokenLore: Follow is a psychological first-person horror game that immerses players in the haunting narrative of Anne, as she grapples with issues of self-acceptance, bullying, and worthlessness while encountering metaphorical surreal creatures that heighten the terror of her journey. Check out the BrokenLore: Follow announcement trailer for a look at its creepy world. BrokenLore: Follow will be available on PC.

#BrokenLoreFollow #Gaming #IGN
